title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, LeBron, NFL, Zion
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Lakers, LeBron, NFL, Zion
description:
The Lakers aren't giving LeBron James all the power

NFL coaches need to evolve when it comes to offense

Zion Williamson simply wants out of New Orleans


Guest: Nick Wright
